amendment.description: Amendment disallows attorney fees in any action claiming that a public school or its agent violates the constitutional prohibition against the establishment of religion by permitting, facilitating, or accommodating a student's religious expression.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 26 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to disallow attorney fees in any action claiming that a public school or its agent violates the constitutional prohibition against the establishment of religion by permitting, facilitating, or accommodating a student's religious expression.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeMint amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 189 (Roll no. 220).
